Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the statement attributed to Nike.

Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide an alternative explanation for the statement attributed to Nike.
